author: Pedro Domingos
title: Using Partitioning to Speed Up Specific-to-General Rule Induction

On the splice junctions dataset, the success of applying partitioning to RISE using a simple combination scheme contrasts with the results obtained by Chan and Stolfo for general-to-specific learners (Chan & Stolfo 1995a).
